title: Talay Prae
overview: Thaet is a beautiful and humble girl. After finishing her studies, she receives a marriage proposal from her mother's family rich friend. But soon it becomes clear that the behavior of her future husband is of great concern. The creeping doubt was quickly dispelled and the wedding took place. Only after the wedding, she realizes that nothing changed for her husband, and she is doomed to loneliness, neglect, and scandals. Will Thaet find the strength to break this burdensome relationship or will she accept this fate?
